price: Do they not see the earth, how many fine kinds of plants We grow in it?
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَمۡ أَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجٖ كَرِيمٍ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
